MobiWashMash

Free your washing machine—free yourself!

A mobile washing machine available anywhere—always by our side.

Tell me more

Your truly personal washing machine.

With MobiWashMash, you will liberate yourself from tedious waiting session in your dark basement or bathroom. Or, you’ll avoid interacting with people in laundromats. Very soon, you’ll be able to do your washing anywhere: on a mountain peak, at the beach, by your fireplace. The unique features of MobiWashMash will show you a whole new world to explore, and free you from routine.

Ever since I’ve started using “MobiWashMash”, my life has become easier.

I’ve finally liberated my wash. I’m free to run it anywhere!

~ Veronica, Poland

More than a washing machine.

The unique functionality of our washing machine WILL change your life. With MobiWashMash, your laundry will be mobile. Just like you!

MobiWashMash—always with you!

Light high-capacity batteries replace the traditional cast-iron lump. Take your washing machine with your, everywhere!

MobiWashMash will think for you!

Our patented compensation mechanism will adapt the spin cycle to the hardness of whatever the machine is standing on. Finally, you can spin dry you clothes at the beach, or in a quarry!

MobiWashMash is there even when it isn’t!

An integrated GPS and the AirWnW app will allow you to discover washing machines in your neighborhood! Air Wash n’ Wear is coming soon to Google Play and the App Store.

Accentuate your individuality.

Choose your color and add-ons. Highly customizable features and add-ons will make your washing machine truly yours.

NATURAL GREEN

Washing machine of the new generation

Latest technology, respect from your peers and money save (if that wasn't obvious).

1

We’ve replaced the iron counterweight with a patented ultralight solar array. A dedicated docking module and automatic firmware upgrades will ensure lasting endurance. MobiWashMash is always ready for the next adventure!

2

A built-in gyroscope and a patented drum balancing mechanism enable MobiWashMash to automatically adjust the spin cycle’s intensity to environmental conditions. Now you can spin dry anywhere: in a forest, on a beach, on a mountaintop. MobiWashMash makes an excellent travel accessory.

3

Sharing is trendy. A GPS module and the AirWnW app allows all the washing machines in your vicinity to be at your disposal! Your plans will never be again spoiled by a burrito sauce staied shirt—even when you’re far from home.

MobiWashMash has been designed with utmost diligence. We develop our products using agile methods, allowing us to fluidly adapt to our clients’ wishes and needs.
